videos.description: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope tosses it up to Anthony Davis, who finishes with a two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KCP and AD connect in transition) 2021/05/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: KCP and AD connect in transition

videos.description: LeBron James glides to the bucket for the layup and the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron makes this and-1 look easy) 2021/05/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron makes this and-1 look easy

videos.description: LeBron James drives between two defenders, draw a foul and still manages to drop in a a reverse layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron splits the defense for another and-1) 2021/05/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron splits the defense for another and-1

videos.description: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope comes up with a steal and then breaks away for a one-handed jam.
